name: Outlook - Ads
description: Removes the right panel containing ads in Outlook/Hotmail/Live.
additional_info:
v4.0 (2020/07/31): Removes the Microsoft Edge ad.
v3.3 (2019/06/21): Solves a bug.
v3.2 (2018/12/12): Solves a bug.
v3.1 (2018/11/30): Solves a bug.
v3.0 (2018/06/17): Compatibility with portrait orientation.
v2.1 (2018/03/12): Solves a bug.
v2.0 (2018/01/15): Compatibility with Beta.
v1.2 (2016/08/29): Solves a bug.
v1.1 (2016/07/15): Solves a bug.

discussions.name: Does what it says. So... It's perfect.
